page.title: 17HELSBY HIGH SCHOOL
page.content: HELSBY HIGH SCHOOL IS MADE UP OF TWO MAIN BUILDINGS AND IS POSITIONED ALONG CHESTER ROAD. IT IS SURROUNDED BY DEMOUNTABLE CLASSROOMS WHERE VARIOUS LESSONS TAKE PLACE. IT USED TO BE A BOYS AND GIRLS GRAMMAR SCHOOL BUT WAS AMALGAMATED IN 1978. SCHOOL UNIFORM IS BOTTLE GREEN FOR THE GIRLS AND NAVY BLUE FOR THE BOYS. THE CURRICULUM INCLUDES MANY SUBJECTS;ENGLISH, MATHS,SCIENCES AND LANGUAGES BEING EXAMPLES. THE SCHOOL DOES NOT USE CORPORAL PUNISHMENT ANY MORE. THERE IS A PARENTS SOCIETY AT THE SCHOOL WHO HELP TO PROVIDE MONEY FOR BUYING EXTRA EQUIPMENT. THERE ARE AT PRESENT 1,2OO PUPILS IN THE SCHOOL AND THE PRESENT HEADMISTRESS IS DR. ROTHWELL.SCHOOL SESSION TIMES ARE FROM 8.5O A.M. TO 12.2O P.M. 12.2O P.M. - 1.35P.M. FOR LUNCH AND THEN FROM 1.35 - 3.45 P.M.
